column4: hi there! i am having a major problem while installing nvidia drivers. can someone help me plz?
best to just ask the channel your actual question (on a single line)
its a bit long to explain
summarize it in one line and provide relevant details in pastebin
Lazy^ and it didnt worked because of wrong kernel version. now even if i install correct drivers, it wont work
if you're using lucid, this is not the right channel.  Lucid is in development
didn't you just say you used lucid repos?
yes, but i didnt do a complete distro upgrade
... because if you upgraded with lucid repos, you probably have a pretty broken system at this point
just my nvidia drivers are not working
just adding lucid repos to a karmic repository and running upgrades is a recipe for disaster
i havent done any upgrades, just few softwares. my mistake was to using the nvidia drivers
i havent done any upgrades, just few softwares -- softwares with dependencies
if you have some sort of hybrid karmic-lucid install at the moment, I would recommend you just reinstall and not mix repositories like that anymore
